page.description: Gets the data from the Grid Component's 'state' object in the form of a text string of name value pairs, delimited with '&' characters.

description.p: For information on how to extract state varialbe values from the string, see [How to Extract the Value from a URI Query String] (the "Parsing a Query String" section explains how this is done and shows an example using the *[js:{grid.object}.getStateInfo()]* method.)
